title: Generate and queue factory sensor data in AMQP
author: Harshil Agrawal
readme:
This workflow generates sensor data, which is used in another [workflow for managing factory incident reports](https://n8n.io/workflows/609).

Read more about this use case and how to build both workflows with step-by-step instructions in the blog post [_How to automate your factory’s incident reporting_](https://n8n.io/blog/learn-to-automate-your-factorys-incident-reporting-a-step-by-step-guide/).

## Prerequisites

  * AMQP, an ActiveMQ connection, and [credentials](https://docs.n8n.io/integrations/credentials/amqp/)



## Nodes

  * [Interval node](https://docs.n8n.io/integrations/core-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.interval/) triggers the workflow every second.
  * [Set node](https://docs.n8n.io/integrations/core-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.set/) set the necessary values for the items that are addeed to the queue.
  * [AMQP Sender node](https://docs.n8n.io/integrations/nodes/n8n-nodes-base.amqp/) sends a raw message to add to the queue.
readme_html:
This workflow generates sensor data, which is used in another workflow for managing factory incident reports.

Read more about this use case and how to build both workflows with step-by-step instructions in the blog post How to automate your factory’s incident reporting.

Prerequisites

  • AMQP, an ActiveMQ  connection, and credentials

Nodes

  • Interval node triggers the workflow every second.
  • Set node set the necessary values for the items that are addeed to the queue.
  • AMQP Sender node sends a raw message to add to the queue.
readme_zh:
该工作流负责生成传感器数据，这些数据将被用于另一个[管理工厂事故报告的工作流](https://n8n.io/workflows/609)。

更多关于此应用场景的详细信息，以及如何通过分步指南构建这两个工作流，请参阅博客文章《[如何实现工厂事故报告自动化](https://n8n.io/blog/learn-to-automate-your-factorys-incident-reporting-a-step-by-step-guide/)》。

## 前提条件

  * 需配置AMQP协议、ActiveMQ连接及[认证凭证](https://docs.n8n.io/integrations/credentials/amqp/)

## 节点说明

  * [间隔触发器节点](https://docs.n8n.io/integrations/core-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.interval/)：每秒触发一次工作流
  * [数据集节点](https://docs.n8n.io/integrations/core-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.set/)：为加入队列的条目设置必要参数值
  * [AMQP发送节点](https://docs.n8n.io/integrations/nodes/n8n-nodes-base.amqp/)：向队列发送原始消息

（注：根据技术文档翻译规范，保留AMQP/ActiveMQ等专业术语不译；节点功能描述采用动宾结构保持技术文档的简洁性；链接地址保留原貌以确保可访问性）
title_zh: 在AMQP中生成并排队工厂传感器数据
